title: How to Make Cardamom Tea

steps.headline: Boil the water in a saucepan over the stove.
Remove from heat and add the tea leaves, cardamom pods and milk.
Return to the heat until it boils again and remove immediately.
Put to one side for 5 minutes as the flavours infuse.
steps.description: It is then ready to serve.

text: Boil the water in a saucepan over the stove.  Remove from heat and add the tea leaves, cardamom pods and milk. Stir. Sweeten to taste.  Return to the heat until it boils again and remove immediately.  Put to one side for 5 minutes as the flavours infuse. It is then ready to serve. Finished.

It is then ready to serve.
